body.name: WESECUU Light Bulb Security Camera 2.4GHz WiFi 2K Security Cameras Wireless Outdoor Motion Detection and Alarm,Two-Way Talk,Color Night Vision,Human Detection, Bulb Camera Compatible with Alexa (2K)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 1 hr 9 mins
features: 【5G & 2.4G Dual Band】The latest 5G & 2.4G dual-band light bulb camera have stronger signal reception, higher stability, longer distance to use, no lag and smoother real-time video compared to traditional 2.4G single-band lightbulb security camera. Simply screw camera light bulbs outdoor into the equipped E26 bulb base (AC110/240V) and plug it into a power outlet, download the Esceecloud APP and simply connect bulb camera 360 degree wifi outdoor to your home wifi.

【Two-Way Audio & Real-Time Alerts】Cameras for home security outside built-in microphone and speaker support two-way language real-time call, communicate with your family members or visitors without any obstacles, realize face-to-face communication. Light socket security camera can set up an audible alarm, when detecting moving objects home security cameras will emit a loud alarm sound and white light at the same time. Scaring away intruder and protecting the family safety.

【Motion Detection & Body Detection Alarm】The PTZ camera light bulb is equipped with a highly sensitive motion sensor that supports horizontal rotation of 355 degree and vertical flip of 90 degree, realizing 360 degree blind spot-free super wide-range accurate detection and tracking of objects. If you turn on human body detection alarm in APP, once security camera outdoor detects human body movement, security camera will record the movement and notify you via APP,thus reducing false alarms.

【2K HD Video & Color Night Vision Function】Outdoor cameras for home security supports 2K HD image, which is clearer than 1080P. The image is very clear in both day and night. Lightbulb camera supports color/infrared night vision, security cameras wireless outdoor can clearly monitor objects within 33 ft in low light environment, excellent night vision experience ensures your home safety 24/7.

【Multi User Sharing & Smart Storage】Lightbulb camera 360 degree wifi outdoor supports multiple users to watch videos. You can share the device with your family and friends for simultaneous monitoring through the app. Camera bulb storage supports cloud storage (paid access required) and up to 128G micro SD card storage.Outdoor camera is Alexa compatible, easy to install and simple to operate.

Previous page Next page 1 Work with Alexa 2 Color Night Vision 3 Human Motion Detection 4 24/7 Recording

Do I must subscribe? Are the AI monitoring and smart notification functions free? You don't need to subscribe is ok also, we provide cloud storage service for 3 days, and the stored videos will be automatically updated every three days; the AI monitoring of human figures and pets is free, which meets the basic daily use needs. Does it support 5F Hz wifi? Hello, this product only supports 2.4G Hz wifi for the time being, and we will launch 5G Hz versions in succession according to market demand. Can the image be flipped? Yes, the video can be clicked to flip, so you can install this bulb camera under a porch light socket, or use an adapter to install it inside your home What is the after-sales service of this product? Provide lifetime service, 24 hours online service

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Security on a budget A++
reviews.reviewText: A coworker showed me his and I just had to have one ! Now everyone I know is ordering and I’m stuck installing, haha. Easy to use. Be sure to get an SD card. These could sell for much more with an added SD card .. still works with my security set up and priced just right. Just like all those high dollar set ups at an amazing price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is an amazing security camera for the price.
reviews.reviewText: This is better than I expected. Good price. Easy to use. I have it in a window looking across the front of my house and if any thing is a problem it is it is so sensitive to motion it records leaves blowing across the yard. One insect flew up to the camera with good clarity. Nig time maybe somewhat affected by the window with reflection, but it does detect delivery trucks with ease. Good product for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works pretty good
reviews.reviewText: Price tag is super reasonable, my camera will not work unless the light switch is flipped but not a deal breaker. Picture quality is actually really good, my husband and I really like the pan feature. I can keep an eye on my chicken coops and the driveway/front door super easy. The app does freeze up on occasion, and the video is slightly laggy but honestly for $20 you really can’t complain

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Younger techy folks may do ok. I Did Not
reviews.reviewText: I've tried several times to figure how to set this up. The QR code to a YouTube vid..ugh ok..or not.The 128g micro SD card sticks out the bottom at a off and crooked way and certainly Not Very Outdoor friendly sealed or enclosed. A Fail in my opinion! I was not able to find the QR to get the correct app to run it. (The SD card still bothering me) as I worried if I got to run dirt water/snow and spiders who love my Xmas lights and more all a issue. So I started to contact customer support offered. But didn't get thru. I feel a falure at this and yet. I need to get this up so when random doorbell rings I know if I need to drag my painful and injured body to the door. Must have it soon. Ugh it what I say after the recent attempt to get it up and running before I have someone wire up a receptacle to exterior area (or more as I hoped,)Please note per me. I'm not feeling well recently and if I'm wrong by not getting customer service care support it's my fault. But also....as with other items with poor or lesser than helpful instructions this is also poorly explained.**Maybe Amazon might require better or assist these non English companies in better paperwork of value.Sadly this is the way of the future...if not..ButI wonder if it will work?Update....No never got it to work.Finally repacked in its box.Now it's just 23 bucks wasted in a small box sitting here...(Notes. I was offered a replacement by seller, I guess as a side deal??? I wasn't sure what they were offering or how. But it didn't seem to fit with in Amazon rules. So I didn't know what to do.I guess they did make very nice offers to me to get a working unit. Wish I had known what to do and how. I'm not greedy and didn't want to cause issue. But I guess I should have tried to find out how to get a working unit.They were very nice.It really came down to the app that was needed to run device. The QR code on camera body didn't get me to a place to get the app. It was just dead end QR code I guess.Still the SD card slot wouldn't fair to well in rain, snow, dirt and bugs.Sometimes you lose money. I just have to forget about this item.ButI should have been able to get it running fairly quickly. Most others I've read about did.So I still think it is the QR code on body of Camera.(Really needed this or 2 to workEspecially post surgery to know to get to door or not)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install and picks up everything 👌 love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the product it works great and picture is very clear my only issue is i wish it was water resistant for when it rains I’ve read the product and the box thoroughly and it does say it anywhere so I’m scared to remove the glass part of my actual outside fixture because i don’t want it go get water damage which makes it hard to use at night because it has a glare from the glass at night

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don’t hesitate to try this camera!!!!
reviews.reviewText: For $20, this camera is totally worth it. Even if it were a dummy camera, it would have been worth $20!!! I ran an extra outlet and socket, installed the hardware, and did the software setup in under an hour. I love the ability to rotate and adjust the height of the camera. I am also really impressed with the zoom ability. I am going to be putting up a couple more! Even if it lasted a year, it’s totally worth it. Update. The second camera I received did not work quite right. They sent a replacement with a return. The system works great with SD card and with its app. I can now watch my packages any time from anywhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ITS A WINNER!!! I Love this Camera!!!
reviews.reviewText: Where to begin! It was of ease to setup outside and by cell! I’m not a tech savvy person in anyway but it was of ease! The view of this camera is magnificent crystal clear! I had a few friends that fell in love with this camera and they have Vivint(I think it’s called) Ring and ADT and they don’t have the clarity as my front door screw in camera! We all watched others arriving as my camera alerted me and tracked 2 people to my door at night! I love the light from this camera leaving no doubt who is arriving! The light from this camera shown across the street brightly! It is wonderful and I want another for my backyard! Thank you very much! OOH! The voice activation is a marvel🤣! They could hear me clearly as I heard them inside having a conversation to my door! I am very happy and pleased with this camera!
